Hospital.Patient

Class Patient

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hospital.People.Person
      • Hospital.Patient.Patient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Schedulable

    public class Patient
extends Person
    A patient, who can be diagnosed, tested and treated

    • Method Detail

      • isDischarged

        public boolean isDischarged()
        Returns whether the patient is discharged or checked in the hospital.
        Returns:
        true if discharged.

      • canBeDischarged

        public boolean canBeDischarged()
        Returns true if the patient can be discharged.
        A patient can be discharged if there are no Diagnsoses without Treatment, not Treatments without result and no MedicalTest without result and if the patient is checked in.
        Returns:
        true if the patient can be discharged.

      • getMedicalTests

        public java.util.ArrayList<MedicalTest> getMedicalTests()
        Returns a list of MedicalTests ordered for this patient.
        Returns:
        The list of MedicalTests done or planned for this patient.

        Parameters:
        t - The MedicalTest to add.

      • checkIn

        public void checkIn(Campus campus)
             throws PatientIsCheckedInException,
                    InvalidArgumentException
        Checks a patient in the hospital.
        Parameters:
        campus - The campus where the patient must be checked in
        Throws:
        PatientIsCheckedInException - If the patient was already checked in.
        InvalidArgumentException - the given campus was null

      • isValidDiagnosisInfo

        public Diagnosis isValidDiagnosisInfo(DiagnosisInfo diagnosis)
                               throws InvalidDiagnosisException
        This method checks if the DiagnosisInfo that came from the outside is valid. i.e. The diagnosisobject was made in the system and is thus 'safe'.
        Parameters:
        diagnosis - The informationObject to be checked
        Returns:
        The diagnosis if no errors are thrown.
        Throws:
        InvalidDiagnosisException - if diagnosis was null or not found

      • removeMedicalTest

        public boolean removeMedicalTest(MedicalTest made)
        Removes a MedicalTest from the patient's file.
        Parameters:
        made - The MedicalTest to remove
        Returns:
        true if the MedicalTest was found.
